name: Heavy Gear II
description:
An Elite Planetary Strike Force is Under Your Command.

Once warring Terra Nova super-powers have now joined forces against the threat of full-scale enemy invasion. Lead your war machine behind enemy lines in stealth raids and reconnaissance missions in a death-defying drive to defend your world's imperiled independence. Only your elite Special Ops squad stands a fighting chance.

DEEPER SPECIAL OPS STEALTH-SQUAD COMBAT IN INDOOR/OUTDOOR MISSIONS.

GRITTIER ATTACKS ON INTELLIGENT ENEMY FORCES THAT ADAPT TO YOUR TACTICS.

HARSHER BATTLES IN HOSTILE ENVIRONMENTS - FROM OUTER SPACE TO SWAMP ZONES.

FASTER COMBAT ACTION WITH ACTIVISION'S ALL-NEW DARK SIDE ENGINE.
